name: 黃正民
objective: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Continuous-Time Systems and Discrete-Time Systems
Week 3. Continuous-Time Systems and Discrete-Time Systems
Week 4. Continuous-Time Systems and Discrete-Time Systems
Week 5. z-Transform
Week 6. z-Domain Analysis
Week 7. z-Domain Analysis
Week 8. Design using Transform Methods
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. State Space Analysis
Week 11. State Space Analysis
Week 12. Digital Controllers Design using State-Space Methods
Week 13. Digital Observer Design
Week 14. Digital Observer Design
Week 15. Implementation Issues of Digital Controllers
Week 16. Applications of Digital Control Systems
Week 17. Applications of Digital Control Systems
Week 18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework (with Matlab programming)                   30%
Midterm Exam (closed book)                                   35%
Final Exam (closed book)                                         35%

-Textbook
Katsuhiko Ogata, Discrete-Time Control Systems, 2nd ed., Pearson Education Taiwan, 2006.
